rukus.text: 29|52|Bigu: «Hamin ʙas, ki Alloh taolo mijoni manu sumo guvoh ast. U on ciro, ki dar osmonho va zamin ast, medonad va kasone, ki ʙa ʙotil garavidaand va ʙa Alloh taolo kufr varzidaand, ononand, ki zijonkorand»

29|53|Va [musrikon] ʙa sitoʙ az tu darxosti azoʙ mekunand va agar mav'idi muqarrare [dar kor] naʙud, jaqinan, azoʙi [ilohi] ʙa [suroƣi] onon meomad va [sarancom] dar hole ki ƣofiland, nogahon ʙa suroƣason xohad omad
29|54|Va [musrikon] ʙa sitoʙ az tu darxosti azoʙ mekunand, va jaqinan, duzax ʙar kofiron ihota dorad
29|55|Ruze, ki azoʙ az ʙoloi saru zeri pojason ononro faro megirad va [Alloh taolo ʙa onon] mefarmojad: «[Kajfari] On ciro ancom medoded, ʙicased
29|56|Ej ʙandagoni man, ki imon ovardaed, ʙe gumon, zamini Man gustarda ast [pas, ʙaroi rahoi az fisori musrikon hicrat kuned] va tanho Maro parasted»
29|57|Har kase casandai [ta'mi] marg ast; on goh ʙa sui Mo ʙozgardonda mesaved

29|58|Va kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, hatman, ononro dar ƣurfahoe az ʙihist coj medihem, ki cujʙorho az zeri on cori ast. Covidona dar on xohand mond. Ci nakust podosi amalkunandagon
29|59|[Hamon] Kasone, ki sikeʙoi varzidand va tanho ʙar Parvardigorason tavakkal mekunand
29|60|Va ci ʙisjor condorone, ki [nametavonand] ruzii xudro haml [jo zaxira] kunand. Alloh taolo ʙa onho va sumo ruzi medihad va U sunavovu donost

29|61|Va agar az onon [musrikon] ʙipursi: «Ci kase osmonho va zaminro ofarida va xursedu mohro ʙa xidmat [-i inson] gumostaast?». Musallaman, megujand: «Alloh taolo. Pas, ci guna [az haq] rujgardon mesavand
29|62|Alloh taolo [ne'matu] ruziro ʙar har ki ʙixohad gusturda medorad va [jo] tang megirad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa har cize donost

29|63|Va agar az onon ʙipursi: «Ci kase az osmon ʙoron firistod va ʙa vasilai on zaminro – pas az xuski va xazonas – zinda kard»? Musallaman, megujand: «Alloh taolo». Bigu: «Hamdu sitois maxsusi Alloh taolo ast», ʙalki ʙestarason [dar in nisonaho] nameandesand
